short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mining Product Innovation Ideas from VOC.
short.zh_CN: 从用户反馈中挖掘产品创新思路。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Buyer reviews are a form of User Generated Content (UGC), containing users' experiences and feelings about a product, and can truly reflect the Voice of Customer (VOC). Reviews are not as standardized as surveys, so it is necessary to first quantify and tag the content of reviews using Natural Language Processing (NLP) technology. Then use Business Intelligence (BI) technology to provide visual multi-dimensional analysis, followed by summarizing reports with ChatGPT. This process transforms unstructured text into objective analysis reports, allowing product managers to make subjective decisions.

In addition to providing analysis for individual products and product categories, this tool also offers comparative analysis across multiple categories, allowing you to quickly understand different products and customer feedback to identify common issues and make differentiations. It can help you optimize: product development, marketing, and customer service strategies.
long.zh_CN:
买家评论是UGC的一种，蕴含用户对于产品的体验与感受，并能真实反映客户之声(VOC)。但评论不如问卷般规范，所以须先用NLP技术将评论内容量化、标签化，再使用BI技术提供视觉化多维分析，然后用ChatGPT做总结报告。将非结构化的文本，转化成客观的分析报告，让产品经理做出主观的决策。

此工具除提供单品、单品类分析外，还提供多品类的对比分析，让您快速了解不同产品及客户反馈，找出共性问题与做出差异化。可帮助您优化：产品开发、市场营销和客户服务策略。
